channel.title: Ruby Lambda on (Insightful) Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Ruby Lambda on (Insightful) Ramblings

item.title: Passing lambdas as parameters
item.description: Background At my current job, I have been working on merchants stores’ integration with third parties. As a part of this task, I found that I needed to ensure that our app batches API calls to the third party. After doing a quick measurement, I found that batching API calls lowered the processing time by about 2x-5x when compared to doing the same calls in sequential order. However, whereas sequential processing had a clear approach of dealing with successful and failed calls, the batch call had none of that.
